metadata.title: USN-6498-1 -- FRR vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that FRR incorrectly handled certain BGP messages. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause FRR to crash, resulting in a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6498-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  frr - 8.4.4-1.1ubuntu1.2 frr-rpki-rtrlib - 8.4.4-1.1ubuntu1.2 frr-snmp - 8.4.4-1.1ubuntu1.2 frr-doc - 8.4.4-1.1ubuntu1.2 frr-pythontools - 8.4.4-1.1ubuntu1.2 No subscription required
